name: sfchronicle
text: It took 124 days from the date of the first reported coronavirus case in California for the total number of cases to reach 100,000. It took 29 days to grow to 200,000. Now, 14 days later, California has exceeded 300,000 cases. https://t.co/J72fbf6yKY

text:
Rep. Karen Bass has emerged as a late entrant in Joe Biden’s veepstakes. The Los Angeles congresswoman would be a different kind of pick than the other women up for the job.

name: sfchronicle
text: She’s a possible running mate for Joe Biden, but right now @RepKarenBass is leading police reform efforts in Congress as chair of @TheBlackCaucus. Listen to her interview with @joegarofoli and @talkopan in our newest episode of It's All Political podcast: https://t.co/5al1EZXuqj

text:
